titleStmt.title: His Majesties proclamation against a traiterous band contrived in the north
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation of the Privy Council of Scotland against the Marquess of Montrose and his "band against God and his Covenant."
Dated at end: Given under our Signet at Edinburgh the 5 of April, and of our Reign the 22 yeer 1646.
At end of document: Per actum Dominorum Commiss. predict. Arch. Primerose Cler.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
